7   package gov.ca.dmv.ease.docs.template.impl;
8   
9   /***
10   * Description: Provides the document template for Organ donor receipt document containing embedded text, 
11   * embedded variables to be substituted and embedded position offsets for phrases
12   * File: DlOrganDonorReceiptTemplate.java
13   * Module:  gov.ca.dmv.ease.docs.util
14   * Created: Aug 11, 2009 
15   * @author mwjzc8
16   * @version $Revision: 1.1 $
17   * Last Changed: $Date: 2009/11/23 16:25:16 $
18   * Last Changed By: $Author: mwrsk $
19   */
20  public class DlOrganDonorReceiptTemplate extends AbstractDocumentTemplate {
21  	/***
22  	 * Instantiates a new driver license organ donor receipt template.
23  	 */
24  	public DlOrganDonorReceiptTemplate() {
25  		populateDlOrganDonorReceiptTemplate();
26  	}
27  
28  	/***
29  	 * This method populates the DriverLicense organ donor template
30  	 * #xx - variable to be replaced
31  	 * @xx - Positon offset for the phrase that follows immediately
32  	 */
33  	private void populateDlOrganDonorReceiptTemplate() {
34  		receiptLines.clear();
35  		receiptLines.add("@10 ORGAN AND TISSUE DONOR RECEIPT   \n");
36  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
37  		receiptLines.add("@30 (NOT A VERIFIED IDENTIFICATION) \n");
38  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
39  		receiptLines
40  				.add("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- \n");
41  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
42  		receiptLines.add("DL/ID: #DL_NUMBER   \n");
43  		receiptLines.add("#FNAME #MNAME #LNAME 	  \n");
44  		receiptLines.add("#ADDR_LINE1   \n");
45  		receiptLines.add("#ADDR_LINE2  \n");
46  		receiptLines.add("DOB: #DOB   \n");
47  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
48  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
49  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
50  		receiptLines
51  				.add(" YOU HAVE GIVEN YOUR CONSENT TO SIGN UP AS AN ORGAN AND TISSUE DONOR WITH \n");
52  		receiptLines
53  				.add(" DONATE LIFE CALIFORNIA, A NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION ESTABLISHED AND DESIGNATED \n");
54  		receiptLines
55  				.add(" AS THE CALIFORNIA ORGAN AND TISSUE DONOR REGISTRAR PURSUANT TO SECTION \n");
56  		receiptLines
57  				.add(" 7152.7 OF THE HEALTH AND SAFETY CODE. WHEN YOU RECEIVE YOUR DL/ID CARD, A \n");
58  		receiptLines
59  				.add(" PINK DONOR DOT WILL BE PRINTED ON THE FRONT OF THE CARD. \n");
60  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
61  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
62  		receiptLines
63  				.add(" IF YOU CHANGE YOUR DECISION OR YOU WANT TO LIMIT/RESTRICT YOUR DONATION TO \n");
64  		receiptLines
65  				.add(" SPECIFIC ORGANS, TISSUES OR RESEARCH, YOU MUST CONTACT DONATE LIFE \n");
66  		receiptLines
67  				.add(" CALIFORNIA BY MAIL AT 1760 CREEKSIDE OAKS DRIVE, SUITE 220, SACRAMENTO, \n");
68  		receiptLines
69  				.add(" CA 95833 OR THROUGH THE WORLD WIDE WEB AT www.donateLIFEcalifornia.org OR \n");
70  		receiptLines
71  				.add(" www.doneVIDAcalifornia.org OR BY CALLING TOLL FREE 1-866-797-2366. \n");
72  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
73  		receiptLines.add(" \n");
74  		receiptLines
75  				.add(" OFFICE - #OFFICE_ID  @30 TRANSACTION DATE #WORK_DATE @60 #USER_ID\n");
76  	}
77  }
